Title: How do I reset my password?
Answer:
To reset your password, follow these steps:

1. Go to the login page
2. Click on 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your inbox for the reset link
5. Click the link and create a new password

Note: The reset link expires after 24 hours. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.

Title: How do I submit a support ticket?
Answer:
You can submit a support ticket through multiple channels:

1. **Online Portal**: Visit our helpdesk portal and click 'New Ticket'
2. **Email**: Send an email to support@company.com
3. **Phone**: Call our support line during business hours

When submitting a ticket, please include:
- Detailed description of the issue
- Screenshots if applicable
- Your contact information
- Priority level (Low, Medium, High, Critical)

Title: How do I request time off?
Answer:
To request time off:

1. Log into the HR portal
2. Navigate to 'Time & Attendance'
3. Click 'Request Time Off'
4. Select the type of leave (Vacation, Sick, Personal)
5. Enter the dates and any notes
6. Submit for manager approval

Requests should be submitted at least 2 weeks in advance for planned leave. Emergency requests will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis.

Title: What is the IT equipment return policy?
Answer:
When leaving the company or upgrading equipment:

1. Schedule an appointment with IT
2. Back up any personal data (with manager approval)
3. Return all equipment including:
   - Laptop/Desktop
   - Monitors
   - Keyboard and mouse
   - Cables and adapters
   - Access cards and keys

Equipment must be returned within 5 business days of your last working day.

Title: How do I connect to the VPN?
Answer:

Troubleshooting:

Title: What is the expense reimbursement process?
Answer:
To submit expenses for reimbursement:

1. Collect all receipts
2. Log into the expense management system
3. Create a new expense report
4. Upload receipt images
5. Categorize each expense
6. Add business justification
7. Submit for approval

Processing time: 5-10 business days after approval
Maximum processing: $500 without pre-approval
